name: Mixed Green Salad With Blue Cheese Dressing
keywords: blue cheese, mixed greens, red wine vinegar, low-carb, raw
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup crumbled blue cheese like Roquefort, Saga or Danish blue
Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste
10 cups loosely packed bite-size pieces watercress, red-leaf lettuce and Belgian endive

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the vinegar, garlic, mustard and cheese in a mixing bowl. Blend well. Add the oil, salt and pepper in a small mixing bowl and blend well with a wire whisk.
Place the salad greens in a bowl. Pour the dressing over the greens and toss well.
